name: PanGoy
description:
PanGoy is a puzzle game where you need to get a puzzle piece by just catching a fish. This game can be also played with a friend if they are within the network (no online session for now). In single player mode, you can upload your own image to be solved! 

I dedicate this game to my love one that is currently far away from me due to pandemic. And by this game we can have a bonding moment together. 

In order to have a good experience in uploaded the image of your choice, you may want to upload an image with a resolution of 1080x720.

Controls:

  • Movement
    • W - Move Up
    • A - Move Left
    • S - Move Down
    • D - Move Right
  • E - Interaction to objects:
    • Objects that have interactions:
      • Fishing Rod:
        • Interact if you want to put a worm to it
        • Interact if you want to pull the rod = to try to catch the fish.
        • NOTE: You can only catch a fish if it is already color GOLD or else it will go away.
  • Worm:
    • Interact if you want to pickup a worm.
    • NOTE: Once picked-up you will have a worm present in one of your 5 boxes. Maximum worm to hold is 5
  • Q - Show list of puzzle blocks that you have collected
    • To close it, click (x) present in the upper right corner of the puzzle block list
    • To zoom an image, click the magnifying glass. Also to close the zoomed image, click the (x) button.
    • NOTE: You cannot move your character if the puzzle block popup or zoom image is present. Click the (x) button to be able to move again.
  • LMB - Left Mouse Button - To solve a puzzle piece in the puzzle field.
    • If the player is within the area of missing puzzle piece, it will show a dark box telling that the player can try to solve that block.
    • If the player do have the missing piece with them, it will be solved once clicked.

    • Just continue catching fish and get the missing piece! Have fun!
